```py
>>> from scipy import special
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> import numpy as np 
```

```py
>>> p_monic = special.hermite(3, monic=True)
>>> p_monic
poly1d([ 1\. ,  0\. , -1.5,  0\. ])
>>> p_monic(1)
-0.49999999999999983
>>> x = np.linspace(-3, 3, 400)
>>> y = p_monic(x)
>>> plt.plot(x, y)
>>> plt.title("Monic Hermite polynomial of degree 3")
>>> plt.xlabel("x")
>>> plt.ylabel("H_3(x)")
>>> plt.show() 
```
